games.title: Rise of the Dead
games.description: Dive into the intense universe of Rise of the Dead, a post-apocalyptic city filled with undead. As a brave survivor, your goal is to reclaim territories, eliminate zombies, and rescue others. Enjoy this free online game on your phone or computer, testing your strategy and combat abilities.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard Controls:  
    Movement:  Arrow keys (W A S D)  
    Shoot:  left click 
    Reload:  R  
    Punch:  E
    Change weapon: Q
    Use prop 1:  G
    Use prop 2: F
    Zoom: Scrollbar

Mobile Controls:  
    Movement:  Virtual Joystick [Joystick Image]  
    Actions:  Tap corresponding buttons

games.title: Build Your Zombie Horde
games.description: Your ZOMBIES await! Summon the undead horde, defeat enemies, collect resources, upgrade your army and conquer lands! A fun and simple strategy autobattler!
games.howToPlayText:
üì± On Mobile:

* Tap anywhere on the screen to summon a zombie.
* Hold your finger and move to control the camera.
* Pinch with two fingers to zoom in or out on the battlefield.

üñ• On PC:

* Click anywhere with any mouse button to summon a zombie.
* Hold a mouse button and move the cursor to control the camera.
* Press P to pause

games.title: War V: Path of the Survivor!
games.description:
War Z: Path of the Survivor! - Story-driven first-person shooter. Go through the story, buy weapons, install various modules on them.

A first-person action shooter.

As a result of the man-made disaster, most of humanity was infected with a dangerous virus... which turns people into zombies

The survivors were forced to form paramilitary groups...

Who knows, maybe it's up to you to find the antidote to the virus and save humanity...

- The world of the zombie apocalypse.
- An exciting storyline.
- Hordes of zombies from the simplest to the mutated.
- A variety of weapons from the real world.
- Various weapon modules and a leveling system.
games.howToPlayText:
Control:
- WASD - movement,
- LSHIFT - switch to running,
- SPACEBAR - jump.
- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot,
- RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - aim,
- T - inspect the weapons.
- R - reload.

games.title: Abandoned Mansion
games.description:
Abandoned Mansion is a first-person horror game set in an abandoned mansion, where a distress call leads you to investigate. Upon arrival, you realize it‚Äôs too late.
The game features item interaction, challenging puzzles, and terrifying monsters.

Features:

Optimized 3D graphics and realistic sound effects
Immersive and thrilling music
Multiple levels to test your skills
Variety of enemy types
Boss fights
Puzzles to solve
Exploration of the abandoned building
Hidden rooms and items
"Abandoned Mansion" will test your courage and survival skills. Can you unravel the mansion's mystery and face its monstrous inhabitants? Play now to find out.
games.howToPlayText:
W, A, S, D - Move
E - Interact
R - Reload
C - Crouch
Tab - Open inventory
Space - Jump
Left mouse button - Attack/Shoot

games.title: Check Wednesday Phone!
games.description:
Check Wednesday Phone! creepy-cute game inspired by the Netflix series. Read messages, solve mysteries, explore Nevermore‚Äôs secrets and play gothic mini‚Äëgames.

Enter Wednesday Addams' digital world in this dark, twisted game. Check emails from Nevermore students, change your gothic phone theme, play eerie mini‚Äëgames, and explore her secret-filled dorm. Earn coins doing tasks Wednesday would probably mock ‚Äî but you‚Äôll need them to unlock the next mystery.
games.howToPlayText: Tap Wednesday‚Äôs phone to begin. Read cryptic emails, change to delightfully gloomy wallpapers, earn coins, and explore her eerie room. Click on strange objects, crack passwords, and uncover secrets hidden in Nevermore. Watch for new messages‚Äîthey guide the story.

games.title: Pulse Of Fear
games.description:
Trapped in an abandoned place where something unspeakable lives, your survival depends on two things: light and silence.

Fuel your flashlight with batteries to shed light on the eerie secrets of the place. Repair generators to restore power and find a way to escape. Search for items: fuses for electrical panels, first aid kits for healing, and keys to locked doors.

Light the way. Fix the system. Start the elevator. Most importantly, stay in the shadows.
games.howToPlayText:
Search generators, activate they. Change fuse, Cut wires and more. Hide from monsters - use beds or lockers
Desktop controls:
Movement: WASD
Look: Mouse
Run: Shift
Action: E
Flashlight: F
Pause: Tab
Drop Item: Q
Inventory: 1,2,3,4,5

Mobile Controls:
Movement: Joystick on Screen
Look: Touch Zone
Run button: Press for run
Action button: Tap for use 
Flashlight button: Activate Flashlight
Pause: Button for pause game
Drop Button: Drop item
Inventory: Change Items

games.title: Locked in Grandma‚Äôs Basement 2: Revenge - Horror Escape
games.description:
Locked in Grandma‚Äôs Basement 2: Revenge ‚Äì Horror Escape is the chilling sequel to the cult classic point-and-click horror game.
After managing to escape once, Grandma has found you again ‚Äî and this time, she‚Äôs locked you in an even darker, more twisted place.
Explore eerie rooms, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover cursed objects and grotesque clues.
Use your logic and courage to find tools, unlock hidden paths, and perform a disturbing ritual to escape.
Every item has a purpose, every detail tells a story ‚Äî and Grandma is always watching.
Will you manage to escape again, or will you become her next ritual offering?
Perfect for fans of horror, escape rooms, and point-and-click adventures.
games.howToPlayText:
This is a classic point-and-click adventure with a first-person view.
You don‚Äôt move around freely ‚Äî instead, you explore each scene from a fixed perspective.
Click on objects to examine them, collect useful items, and use them in the right places to solve puzzles and progress through the story.
Every interaction matters, so pay attention to details and think logically to escape.

games.title: The Road Home: Granny Escape
games.description:
The Road Home: Granny Escape is a terrifying 3D horror survival game where your only goal is to escape a haunted house filled with danger, puzzles, and fear. You're not here by accident ‚Äî Granny and Grandpa brought you here on purpose, and they won‚Äôt let you go easily.

üïØ The Story
Your trip home took a dark turn. While riding a bus through a remote forest, a massive tree crashed down onto the road. You stepped out to investigate‚Ä¶ and everything went black.

You wake up in a locked, eerie house. The windows are boarded up. The doors are sealed. And something is watching you. You soon realize the terrifying truth: you‚Äôve been kidnapped and trapped by an evil Granny and her mad husband.

This isn‚Äôt just a place ‚Äî it‚Äôs a prison designed to break you.

üéØ What You Must Do
-Explore the dark and haunted house
-Solve puzzles and unlock secret passages
-Craft useful items from the resources you find
-Avoid Granny and Grandpa ‚Äî they can hear your every move
-Survive deadly traps and unpredictable chases
-Make your way to freedom before it‚Äôs too late

‚öôÔ∏è Game Features
-A chilling 3D horror experience with immersive atmosphere
-Evil and intelligent enemies who react to sound and movement
-Multiple escape paths and secret endings
-A full crafting system: collect, combine, survive
-Puzzles, keys, locked rooms, and hidden objects
-A heavy dose of mental horror and psychological tension
-Every sound matters. Every choice counts.

‚ùóÔ∏è Not Just a Game ‚Äî A Nightmare
This isn‚Äôt just a scary house ‚Äî it‚Äôs a living nightmare. There‚Äôs evil in the walls, and death behind every corner. Will you outsmart your captors, or will fear consume you?

Use your brain, stay quiet, and find your way out‚Ä¶ if you still can.

Download The Road Home: Granny Escape ‚Äî and see if you have what it takes to survive the fear, escape the madness, and get back home.
games.howToPlayText:
WASD ‚Äî Move
C ‚Äî Crouch
Space ‚Äî Jump

The main goal is to escape from the old people's house. Find useful items and use them to your advantage.

games.title: Fruitsland: Escape from the Amusement Park
games.description:
Welcome to Fruitsland ‚Äì a unique amusement park where fun awaits at every turn! Colorful carousels, exciting rides, and entertainers dressed as fruits ‚Äì apples, bananas, watermelons, and oranges ‚Äì fill the park. Children‚Äôs laughter fills the air, as school groups with teachers and families with kids flock to enjoy the day. Everything seems perfect, but not all is as it seems... One careless step, and you fall through an old hatch, landing in a spooky, long-abandoned part of the park hidden underground.

Before you lies a chilling, forgotten underground park where strange scientific experiments were once conducted. Only remnants of these experiments remain now, with crumbling rides and deserted game rooms that carry no joy. An eerie silence surrounds you, broken only by the sounds of old machinery and the shuffling of mysterious creatures. The first location is themed around apples ‚Äì at first, it seems harmless, but soon you realize you‚Äôre trapped. As you study the remnants of the scientists‚Äô journals, you uncover their plans to bring fruit to life, fruit that would entertain visitors around the clock. The sinister plan of the park‚Äôs owner aimed to turn fruits into real entertainers, capable of anything to amuse guests.

Your mission now is to escape from this underground horror. Every step brings new puzzles, challenging tasks, and deadly monsters that lurk around every corner, the results of failed experiments. Surviving here won‚Äôt be easy: these animated fruits have come to life, and now they‚Äôre hunting you. Every corner is a new survival test filled with horror, fear, and adrenaline. Choose your path wisely, solve puzzles to find your way out, and avoid deadly traps and monsters that only look like harmless fruits.

The first monster you will encounter is a blind apple, a nightmare resembling a zombie. It aimlessly roams the empty sections of the park, filling everyone who sees it with dread.

The second section is dedicated to the banana. This is the second colorful monster brought to life by horrifying experiments. Seeing it makes you feel as if something is invading your mind.

The third section of the underground park is dedicated to the Pomegranate ‚Äî a sinister fruit with two large eyes. These roaming eyes not only track unwelcome guests but also attack them. They emerge from their sockets and move independently, chasing their target across the area.

Can you escape from this park and see the sunlight again? Will you find a way to break free from the gloomy underground? This horror game is for those ready for survival, monster hunts, immersion in fear, and adrenaline! Complete quests, solve puzzles, defeat monsters, and find freedom while uncovering the mysteries of Fruitsland.

Download this game to dive into the fruit garden‚Ä¶ if you dare!
games.howToPlayText:
WASD - Move
C - Crouch
Space - Jump

The main goal is to escape the park by solving puzzles. Find useful items and use them to your advantage.

games.title: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor
games.description: Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor ‚Äì A 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Battle the undead, explore vast locations, uncover dark secrets, and fight to survive in a mysterious, deadly new reality.
games.howToPlayText:
Stalker 2033: The Path of the Survivor  - is an 3D action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world.. Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!


A huge location populated by a wide variety of inhabitants!

The quiet life of the middle lane is disrupted by a mysterious catastrophe ‚Äì an unknown phenomenon turns people into the living dead. The main character finds himself in the epicenter of the tragedy by accident: being away from the city, he learns about the beginning of the apocalypse just two weeks after it began.

Now he has to not only fight for survival in a new, cruel world, but also reveal its secrets. Collecting information bit by bit, he tries to understand the nature of the disaster and its impact on people..

Gameplay Features:

‚Ä¢ Exploring a post-apocalyptic world 
‚Ä¢ Interacting with the few survivors
‚Ä¢ Search for resources and create equipment
‚Ä¢ * Battles with different opponents
‚Ä¢ Thrilling zombie apocalypse storyline
‚Ä¢ Realistic arsenal of weapons

Immerse yourself in the exciting world of the post-apocalypse! Collect an arsenal of deadly weapons and fight for survival!

Control:
- WASD - movement,
- LSHIFT - switch to running,
- SPACE - jump.
- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - shoot,
- RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - aim,
- MOUSE WHEEL, Q - change weapons.
- T - inspect the weapons.
- R - reload.
- M - map.

games.title: Room 45
games.description:
You're trapped in Room 45‚Äîand it's watching you.
There are no instructions, no tutorials. Just you, a locked door, and a growing sense that something isn‚Äôt right. Solve twisted puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and piece together what happened here‚Ä¶ before time runs out.

Every object might be a clue. Every second counts.
Can you escape Room 45? Or will it remember you?
games.howToPlayText:
E - INTERACT ( you can also interact with left mouse )
X - CLOSE
C - CROUCH

games.description: Step into the exciting realm of Lift Defender Zombie Carnage, where your role as an elevator guardian is crucial for humanity's survival against a zombie apocalypse. Protect the last safe spaces in skyscrapers through thrilling online gameplay available on both mobile and desktop devices.
games.howToPlayText:
After the zombie apocalypse, the surviving people began to live in huge skyscraper shelters.
The floors are connected only by elevators.
You are an elevator guard who must not allow emerging monsters to penetrate from floor to floor.
- Clear the floors
- Save people
- Earn money
- Unlock new weapons
Key game features:
- simple controls
- large selection of weapons
- various levels
- stylized zombie shooting gallery

games.title: Creepy playtime
games.description: Enter the unsettling realm of Creepy Playtime, where shadows hide lurking threats. Collect soda cans while avoiding detection in this suspenseful game. A haunting voice taunts your every step. Can you escape the monsters, or will they ensnare you? Play this frightening adventure for free online on PC and mobile.
games.howToPlayText:
You woke up backstage, filled with monsters and mysteries! The locals do not like uninvited guests, so its better not to get caught by them. To get out of the backstage, you need to collect soda cans scattered throughout the backstage. But be careful, the monsters behind the scenes are very vigilant! Can you get out? If not, then you will stay there forever!

Controls on PC:
Movement - WASD
Jump - Space

Controls on smartphone:
Movement - Left joystick
Turns - Right joystick
Jump - Button

games.title: Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive
games.description: Experience the excitement of Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive, a dynamic game where you merge items to craft powerful tools and potions. Test your strategy as you navigate dungeons. Play for free online on both mobile and desktop. Embrace your heroic side!
games.howToPlayText:
Welcome to our thrilling adventure game! Your journey consists of two main parts: merging items and exploring dungeons.

Merging Items 
In the lower part of the screen, you will find the merging grid. This is where you combine different items to gain various effects:
- Weapons: Merge different weapon parts to create powerful weapons that deal damage to enemies.
- Potions: Combine potions to restore health and boost your survivability.
- Keys: Merge keys to unlock chests scattered throughout the dungeon, which contain valuable loot.
- Coin Pouches: Collect and merge coin pouches to purchase new items from the shop and expand your inventory by buying travel bags from the merchant.

Dungeon Exploration 
In the upper part of the screen, your character moves through the dungeon level by level. Use the items you've merged to overcome challenges and defeat enemies as you delve deeper into the dungeon. 

Embark on this epic journey, combine powerful items, and conquer the depths of the dungeon!

games.title: The Depth of the Limbo
games.description:
The game is about a girl in limbo who has to complete all the levels to wake up. Top view: The character must overcome 13 levels. Each level is a one‚Äîminute test cycle, but the camera rotates around the hero, changing the orientation of the space. Due to the moving camera, you can get confused about right, left, up and down, which turns simple routes into a puzzle.

The lines of the path seem familiar until they turn around your head, forcing you to rethink each goal. The goal is simple and touching: to complete the route from beginning to end, overcome the inner noise of fear, and wake up refreshed and free.
games.howToPlayText:
On the computer:
To make the character move to the right, left, up or down, press the D, A, W, S keys or the arrows to the right, left, up or down, respectively.

On a smartphone or tablet:
To make the character move to the right, left, up or down, press the arrow buttons to the right, left, up or down, respectively.
